title: Agent Boost

title: Custom Software Development
description: We build web apps, APIs, and automation tools tailored to your needs. From MVPs to production systems, we code it right the first time.

title: Linux Server Rescue
description: Server down? Disk full? Config broken? We'll get your Linux servers back online fast. Emergency support available.
details: Expert troubleshooting for crashed services, performance issues, security incidents, and disaster recovery.

title: DevOps & Infrastructure
description: CI/CD pipelines, containerization, monitoring, and infrastructure-as-code. We automate the boring stuff so you can focus on building.

title: System Optimization
description: Slow database? High CPU usage? We analyze, optimize, and fine-tune your systems for better performance and lower costs.
details: Performance profiling, database query optimization, caching strategies, and resource optimization.

title: Technical Consulting
description: Need a second opinion? Architecture review? Technology decisions? We provide honest, practical technical advice.
details: Architecture design, technology stack selection, code reviews, and technical due diligence.
